name: test_remove
description:
arrange: deploy the cloudflared charm and cloudflared-route provider charms.
    act: remove the cloudflared charm.
    assume: cloudflared charm should uninstall all charmed-cloudflared snap instances.
descriptionHtml:
arrange: deploy the cloudflared charm and cloudflared-route provider charms.
act: remove the cloudflared charm.
assume: cloudflared charm should uninstall all charmed-cloudflared snap instances.
